name: pdf-modifier-mcp
description: A robust PDF modification tool for AI agents. Preserves layout and fonts while performing find/replace operations.

tools.name: read_pdf_structure
tools.description: Extract the complete structural content of a PDF document (pages, text blocks, fonts, positions).

tools.name: inspect_pdf_fonts
tools.description: Search for specific text terms and report their font properties (name, size, family) to ensure accurate style matching.

tools.name: modify_pdf_content
tools.description: Find and replace text in a PDF while preserving original font styles and layout. Supports regex and hyperlinks.
